name: Classic Spider The Card Game
description:
Despite having retina resolution graphics Classic Spider Solitaire is optimized for each device in speed and battery use!

Having trouble with your game? The Winning Deal option creates a hand which is guaranteed have a winning solution. Use hints to help you finish!

Think you have the world best Classic Spider Solitaire score in the App Store? With Apple's Game Center enabled, you can compete via Game Center leaderboards in fairway to watch how your Patience speed stacks up against other players!
The addicting easy game you’ve been playing on your computer for years now goes wherever you do.

Download Classic Spider Solitaire today!

HD Themes, New Cards Packs, and Card Backs. Hearts or Spades. Change the way your game looks, or don't!
FEATURES:
- Themed Skin Packs
- Winning Deals
- Daily Challenge
- Live Game Center leaderboards
- Custom Card Themes & Backgrounds
- Achievements to Unlock
- Game saves if you leave the app
- Unlimited Undo
- Stack Auto Complete Option
- Competitive Scoring
- Statistics
- Taptic feedback
- Incredible High Definition Graphics
- Best Battery Life

Check out the best Classic Spider Solitaire iMessage Stickers for your chat messages! To send a sticker, open your Messages app. Tap the Apps button (which looks like the App Store icon), then select our Classic Spider Solitaire icon to view and pick from the Klondike sticker pack.

For the latest info, more cardgames and what we are up to, check out our website.
